name: THE PRE FESTIVE EDIT - UTSAV by Conscious Souk @love,OORU
description: Conscious Souk presents UTSAV - THE PRE FESTIVE EDITJoin us for a vibrant marketplace featuring emerging, sustainable brands, local creators, and independent designers. Discover a diverse range of products, with some great food & wine including:- Clothing- Ceramics- Home Decor- Ethical Gifting Products- Jewellery- Personal Care Products- ArtDates: 27-28th July 2024  Time: 11am-8pmLocation: love,OORU RooftopCheers Partners : THE SOURCE, SULA VINEYARDS. First 50 signups get a free wine tasting.*** 27 July 2024 LIVE MUSIC BY KEYAA HIRA @7:30PM ***LAMHE POTTERY HANDBUILDING WORKSHOP27-28th July 2024  - 11-12:30PM / 3:30-5PM***DYEING & BLOCK PRINTING WITH NATURAL COLORS27 July 2024  KIDS(+5YRS) - 3-3:45PMADULTS - 4:30-5:30PM28 July 2024 KIDS(+5YRS) - 12:30 - 1:15PMADULTS - 2-3PM

location.name: love OORU
location.address: No. 136, Evergreen PARC, Rooftop, 1st Cross Road, 5th Block,, Koramangala, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: love OORU
organizer.description: love.OORU is a tranquil oasis on the rooftop which is the perfect setting for enjoying beautiful sunsets, hosting private dinners & events, and maybe indulging in a chef's table experience.  Taking inspiration from Bengaluru, her history, geography, culture, and most importantly her stories, love.OORU was born as an identity rooted in Bengaluru and all it has to offer.

name: The Courtyard Picnic | July 2024
description: Gather under the shade of a towering tree in the heart of the city and enjoy a perfect day of sunshine (hopefully), board games, wine and coffee, and of course, some delicious picnic plates.Bring your furry friends along to enjoy a day out!Picnic plates by Arthi RathoreStarters - Sunday roast salad with a herbed Sunday pesto- Lasagne TartletsMains - Rigatoni Romesco- with citrus rocket, nuts, caper berry oil & goats cheese- Sicilian chicken with chives and roast baby creamers. Dessert - Sticky toffee pudding with a stout butterscotch sauce & clotted creamSalad﻿Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain or other unforeseen conditions, the event will be moved indoors.

location.name: Courtyard
location.address: 105, Kengal Hanumanthaiah Rd, opp. Corporation Bank, Raja Ram Mohanroy Extension, Shanti Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027, India

organizer.description: COURTYARD is a gathering of ideas and experiences in  the heart of Bangalore. We are an open space for curated  culinary, cultural and creative exchanges, in any form they  choose to take

name: The Courtyard Baithak - An Evening of Ghazals
description: The Courtyard Baithak series is curated by tabla wizard and prodigy Trilochan Kampli, who with his uncompromising standards in music, evokes the best from every artist that he invites to perform. We are bringing musicians and audiences together on a sublime musical journey.Exclusive gatherings, quiet strains of exquisite music, and dedicated artists across selected genres - The Courtyard Baithak series promises a true classical musical experience.Please note: The ticket includes performance onlyAbout the artist- Kaamod SubhashKaamod Subhash is an accomplished artist, singer, music composer, and vocal coach with a rich musical heritage from Nagpur. Trained under his father, Shri R. Subhash, a renowned Marathi Ghazal singer, Kaamod holds a master’s degree in Hindustani Classical Vocal Music from the University of Mumbai.Kaamod has received prestigious accolades, including the Yuva Ratna Award for his contributions to India’s cultural development, proposed by the legendary Shri Jagjit Singh, and the ‘Versatile Star Artist Of The Year Award’ by the University of Mumbai in 2007.Influenced by ghazal legends like Mehdi Hasan, Ghulam Ali, Jagjit Singh, and Hariharan, Kaamod’s talent has been recognized and praised by maestros such as Ghulam Ali, Anup Jalota, Pankaj Udhas, Talat Aziz, and Ustad Rashid Khan.Kaamod Subhash brings his unique flavor to every performance, promising an enchanting evening of ghazals at our event.Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Children aged 5 and older require a ticket.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Kashmir Kitchen
description: Tijouri is a pioneering Indian restaurant that offers a unique dining experience through monthly pop-ups featuring home chefs from across India. Located at Radisson Blu Atria, Bangalore, Tijouri aims to bring the diverse flavours of India to the heart of Bangalore, celebrating the rich culinary traditions of the country through an authentic and immersive dining experience. Our mission is to preserve traditional recipes and introduce them to a wider audience through both dining experiences and retail products.As our first pop up we bring to you the Kashmir Kitchen by Jasleen Marwah. Jasleen is a self taught Chef, who started her Kashmiri delivery kitchen l, Namak by jasleen, in the lockdown. Exploring her roots and Kashmiri cuisine became an important part of her food journey and she believes in telling these stories through her food. Her signature dish is the Tabakh Maaz, a dish that also features in the Wazwan- mutton ribs slow cooked in whole spices and then pan fried in ghee.Menu for this Weekend:Welcome Drink:Apricot Drink/Noon ChaOn the Table:Nadru FriesSmall Plates:Kaladi Kucha/Paneer Kanti/Masala TschothChicken Tujji/Harissa/Tabakh MaazLarge Plates:Veg:Guchi YakhniNadru PalakRajmaTehriRadish ChutneyOnion ChutneyNon- VegRogan Josh,Chicken Kofta YakhniChicken with Dried HaakYakhni PulaoDessert:Walnut Halwa/Khubaani/ShuftaEnd With:KahwaThis menu is indicative of what will be served and maybe tweaked or changed.Terms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked. Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

location.address: 1, Palace Rd, Ambedkar Veedhi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Dyeing & Block Printing with Natural Colors
description: Dyeing & Block Printing with Natural Colors : Design your own eco-friendly pouch using natural dyes! This engaging workshop is perfect for unleashing creativity and learning a valuable skill.Learn about natural dyes and have fun while using them to dye your own clothes, or buy a ready to dye product from us and dye it!For Adults - Dyeing in a natural plant Indigo vat and learning shibori techniques : on either your old garment or buy a new product from our stall and dye it. (garment should be a top/tee/stole/bag, light color or white, cotton or natural blend, not polyester.)For Kids - Tie and dye your old tee or top and dye in a red madder plant natural dye bath. Or buy a new product from our stall and dye it. Conscious Souk presents UTSAV - THE PRE FESTIVE EDITJoin us for a vibrant marketplace featuring emerging, sustainable brands, local creators, and independent designers. Discover a diverse range of products, with some great food & wine including:- Clothing- Ceramics- Home Decor- Ethical Gifting Products- Jewellery- Personal Care Products- ArtDates: 27-28th July 2024  Time: 11am-8pmLocation: love,OORU RooftopCheers Partners : THE SOURCE, SULA VINEYARDS. First 50 signups get a free wine tasting.*** 27 July 2024 LIVE MUSIC BY KEYAA HIRA @7:30PM ***LAMHE POTTERY HANDBUILDING WORKSHOP27-28th July 2024  - 11-12:30PM / 3:30-5PM

location.name: love OORU
location.address: No. 136, Evergreen PARC, Rooftop, 1st Cross Road, 5th Block,, Koramangala, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: love OORU
organizer.description: love.OORU is a tranquil oasis on the rooftop which is the perfect setting for enjoying beautiful sunsets, hosting private dinners & events, and maybe indulging in a chef's table experience.  Taking inspiration from Bengaluru, her history, geography, culture, and most importantly her stories, love.OORU was born as an identity rooted in Bengaluru and all it has to offer.

name: Dyeing & Block Printing with Natural Colors
description: Dyeing & Block Printing with Natural Colors : Design your own eco-friendly pouch using natural dyes! This engaging workshop is perfect for unleashing creativity and learning a valuable skill.Learn about natural dyes and have fun while using them to dye your own clothes, or buy a ready to dye product from us and dye it!For Adults - Dyeing in a natural plant Indigo vat and learning shibori techniques : on either your old garment or buy a new product from our stall and dye it. (garment should be a top/tee/stole/bag, light color or white, cotton or natural blend, not polyester.)For Kids - Tie and dye your old tee or top and dye in a red madder plant natural dye bath. Or buy a new product from our stall and dye it. Conscious Souk presents UTSAV - THE PRE FESTIVE EDITJoin us for a vibrant marketplace featuring emerging, sustainable brands, local creators, and independent designers. Discover a diverse range of products, with some great food & wine including:- Clothing- Ceramics- Home Decor- Ethical Gifting Products- Jewellery- Personal Care Products- ArtDates: 27-28th July 2024  Time: 11am-8pmLocation: love,OORU RooftopCheers Partners : THE SOURCE, SULA VINEYARDS. First 50 signups get a free wine tasting.*** 27 July 2024 LIVE MUSIC BY KEYAA HIRA @7:30PM ***LAMHE POTTERY HANDBUILDING WORKSHOP27-28th July 2024  - 11-12:30PM / 3:30-5PM

name: Brushes & Besties!
description: Join us on August 4th (Friendship Day!) for an epic paint party! Create unforgettable memories with your besties through creativity and fun. Whether you’re coming with a group of friends or flying solo, everyone is welcome to join the fun!Event Highlights:Date: August 4thTime: 4 to 6pmLocation: Board in the City, KoramangalaWhat’s in Store:Collaborative Tote Bag Painting: Each friend’s design will fit together like a puzzle to form one big masterpiece!Swap Party Madness: Every 5 minutes, swap your tote bag with a friend and continue painting. Add your unique touch to each other’s bags.Take Home a Keepsake: End the event with a beautifully painted tote bag filled with your friends’ creativity.Tickets: Rs 899 (includes a Rs 299 redeemable food/beverage voucher)Don't miss out on this fun and creative celebration of friendship. Grab your friends or come solo and join us for a day of painting, laughter and unforgettable memories!

location.address: 7th Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 7th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Pop Up Paint Party by Manisha
organizer.description: Whether you’re celebrating a birthday or a baby-shower, planning a girl’s night out or a corporate event, we’ll work with you to create a bespoke experience that meets your needs. Unleash your inner Picasso while having a blast!

name: Plats around the world by Plats, Delhi | Conservatory, Bangalore
description: Plats Around the World: Delhi's Finest by Chefs Hanisha and JamsheedPlats brings the world to your plate with its unique culinary spin. Chefs and Patrons Hanisha and Jamsheed present a contemporary dining experience showcasing honest plates of food that transcend specific cuisines. Their dishes are technique-driven, using the finest seasonal produce and globally inspired flavors. The result is food that is refined yet comforting, familiar yet creative.The menu is an amalgamation of dishes inspired by the chefs' travels and cherished meals with family and friends. With a focus on flavor-forward dishes, no-fuss plating, and hearty portions, Plats embodies what Hanisha and Jamsheed love to eat, cook, and share.SET MENUPLEASE NOTE:The vegetarian menu includes dishes that contain eggs. We can provide eggless alternatives upon prior request.If you have a seafood allergy, we can replace seafood courses on the non-vegetarian menu with vegetarian option.Please mention your preferences while booking your spot.Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Crisp potato pave, smoked carrot lox tartare, dill cream cheese, capers, pickled shallots Course 2Charred young broccoli, sambal romesco, burnt lime and peanut crumble Course 3Char grilled exotic mushrooms, yellow chilli and feta huancaina, smoked bandel cheese, pickled chillies and picante salsaCourse 4Pan fried gnocchi, smoked eggplant kashq, charred tomatoes, pistachio, pomegranate molasses, fetaCourse 5Roasted butternut squash mille feuille, sauce verdure, sweet potato crumb, chevre, pickles Course 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked dark chocolate apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleNon-Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Prawn and calamari plancha, zesty passionfruit tigre de leches, celery herb salad, prawn oilCourse 2Korean fried shrimp stuffed chicken wing, gochuchang caramel, kimchi, sesame and scallionCourse 3Smoked pork and chorizo dumpling, spiced chorizo and tomato broth, bacon crumble and pickled green appleCourse 4Chicken steak presse, stuffed morrels, roast garlic and miso emulsion, chicken jus Course 5Braised and pulled lamb crumbed steak, caramelized onion and mint, spiced lamb jus, mashed potatoesCourse 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked brandy dark chocolate and apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: Lamhe Pottery Hand Building Workshop
description: Moments in Clay: A Lamhe Pottery Hand Building WorkshopUnleash your creativity and dive into the world of pottery with our "Moments in Clay" workshop. Learn the three essential hand-building techniques: slab making, coiling, and pinching. Enjoy a fun-filled, joyful time working with clay, discovering a new art form that brings you into the present moment. Every passing moment is a chapter in our tale. Create your own unique pieces and experience the magic of hand-building with us.Duration: 1.5 hours Techniques Covered: Slab-making, Coiling, and PinchingSession Timings: Morning Session: 11:00 AM - 12:30 PM Afternoon Session: 3:30 PM - 5:00 PM Session Dates: 27 July 2024 & 28 July 2024 (Two sessions a day) Age Limit: 18+ Cost: Rs. 1299 per person (including all raw materials) Takeaway: Items created during the session are a takeaway. Extra Charge for firing.Extra Firing Charge: Participant's piece will be glaze-fired and ready for pickup in approximately 4 weeks, subject to kiln conditions. We will notify you once the pieces are ready for pickup. Shipping not included. Please arrange for pickup at our studio. (Rs. 150 per piece firing)Conscious Souk presents UTSAV - THE PRE FESTIVE EDITJoin us for a vibrant marketplace featuring emerging, sustainable brands, local creators, and independent designers. Discover a diverse range of products, with some great food & wine including:- Clothing- Ceramics- Home Decor- Ethical Gifting Products- Jewellery- Personal Care Products- ArtDates: 27-28th July 2024  Time: 11am-8pmLocation: love,OORU RooftopCheers Partners : THE SOURCE, SULA VINEYARDS. First 50 signups get a free wine tasting.*** 27 July 2024 LIVE MUSIC BY KEYAA HIRA @7:30PM

name: Friday Deli Counter
description: Friday deli counterWant to spend a day in the heart of Bangalore on a work-day sipping on a drink and enjoying the weather this city blesses us with? Come spend a day with us at the Studio by Copper + Cloves.Launching the "Friday - Workday Deli Counter". Nourish yourself at our ‘all you can eat’ deli counter and work from out beautiful cafe at the studio that is normally a members-only space! You can make come by all yourself or get your team to brainstorm at our beautiful, private studio cafe set-up.

name: Yoga sundowner with Julia
description: Join us for a wonderful evening- starting with a sunset yoga class at our new studio, led by Julia.A combination of asana flow, breath and body alignment and internal awareness and intention. In these classes, you will learn to connect your movement with breath. As you practice this flow, your inner voice and intuition will get louder and louder until you can’t help but hear it. Our intuition is our greatest guide, and learning to listen is a powerful tool for navigating the wonderful flow of life.Copper + Cloves will create a delicious nourishing spread for you - the perfect place to meet new people - the perfect sundowner evening that will leave you fresh for the weekend.

name: Impressions on Clay
description: One Day Pottery Workshop: Impressions on Clay 🎨Get ready to roll up your sleeves and dive into a day of clay-tastic fun at our "Impressions on Clay" pottery workshop! Whether you’re a pottery newbie or a seasoned sculptor, this workshop is all about letting your creativity run wild and making some awesome, personalized pottery.What’s in Store:-Clay Play 101:Kick things off with a quick intro to clay and some tools to learn how the material works.- Texture Extravaganza: Discover how to imprint funky textures and eye-catching patterns on your clay using everything from natural finds to funky stamps.- Hands-On Creativity: Dive into the fun with lots of time to experiment and play with different techniques. Let your imagination be your guide!- Guided Creations: Follow along with our expert instructor to create a unique pottery piece that’s all your own. No two pieces will be alike!- Glazing and Firing Scoop:Get the lowdown on how your masterpiece will get that final touch of magic through firing and glazing (we’ll handle the tricky stuff, of course!).What to Bring:- Clothes that can handle a splash of creativity (think fun and comfy!).- Any special items you’d like to imprint (leaves, stamps, or even funky textures you find at home).

name: Private Guided Tour of the Automotive Wonders  of the World!
description: For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

name: Make your own Bud Vases: Pottery Workshop
description: One Day Pottery Workshop: Bud Vase Coiling Technique Unleash your inner artist and create a stunning bud vase using the ancient coiling technique at our one-day workshop! Whether you're a pottery enthusiast or a curious beginner, this workshop is designed to guide you through the fun and meditative process of hand-building a beautiful vase.What to Expect:-Welcome and Introduction: Begin the day with a warm welcome and an overview of the coiling technique, an age-old method that’s perfect for crafting unique and intricate shapes.-Clay Preparation: Learn how to prepare your clay, ensuring it’s just right for coiling.-Coiling Technique Mastery: Discover the step-by-step process of rolling out coils, stacking, and smoothing them to create the body of your vase. We’ll cover tips and tricks to make your vase both sturdy and beautiful.-Creative Touches: Add your personal flair with decorative elements, textures, and designs to make your vase one-of-a-kind.-Finishing Up: Learn about drying, firing, and glazing options to complete your vase at home or in a studio.What to wear:- Clothes that can get a little messy (embrace the clay!).Included in the Workshop:- All the clay and tools you’ll need.- Expert instruction from our experienced pottery teacher.- A fun, supportive environment where creativity can flourish.Join us for a delightful day of creativity and craftsmanship! By the end of the workshop, you'll have your own handmade bud vase and the satisfaction of learning a timeless pottery technique. Sign up now and let’s coil some magic together! 🌟👩‍🎨🖌️
